Description.description: The business process description, limited to 255 characters.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this business process is active (true) or not (false).

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

NamespacePrefix.description: A unique string to distinguish this type from any others.
